page.title: 17A SUMMER CARNIVAL IN BOOTLE.
page.content: We have had a carnival in{Bootle.}It is part of{Mersyside's Community {Summer Festival.}It began on Saturday 8th June at the{North Park.}People could enjoy the free{entertainment. They had morris dancers, clowns, jugglers and face painters.They had steel and brass bands playing different tunes. At the{New Strand, shoppers got a surprise because they had escapologists and jugglers.There were comedians there to make them laugh.The{Carnival}lasts for two months and other events include:puppet shows,street theatres,folk singing, disco's and Latin American dancing.On the{Dock Road}they have a pram race and a fancy dress parade.I think the {carnival}is a great idea because old and young people can enjoy it.We don't have to pay for it as it's all free. People can laugh and have good fun.
